thread.title: BRIEF-Hilton Announces Launch Of Senior Notes Offering

title: BRIEF-Hilton Announces Launch Of Senior Notes Offering
text:
April 10, 2018 / 11:52 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Hilton Announces Launch Of Senior Notes Offering Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc: * HILTON ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF SENIOR NOTES OFFERING 
* UNIT INTENDS TO OFFER $500 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF ISSUERâ€™S SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 
* UNIT TO USE PROCEEDS, AVAILABLE CASH, BORROWINGS, TO FUND REPURCHASE OF 10 MILLION SHARES OF CO BENEFICIALLY OWNED BY HNA TOURISM GROUP CO 
* IF CO ELECTS TO BUY UP TO 6.5 MILLION ADDITIONAL SHARES, TO FUND PURCHASE WITH CASH, BORROWINGS UNDER REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY, AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
